com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder

Class PaintToolBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder.PaintToolBuilder

  • public class PaintToolBuilder
extends Object
    A utility for building paint tools.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Creates a paint tool as previously configured.

      Specifies whether the tool should draw a single shape, or a trace of multiple shapes as the mouse is dragged.

      • makeActiveOnCanvas

        public PaintToolBuilder makeActiveOnCanvas(JFXPaintCanvasNode jfxPaintCanvasNode)
        Makes the newly built tool active on the given canvas. The tool can be activated manually (instead of via this method by invoking PaintTool.activate(PaintCanvas)).
        Parameters:
        jfxPaintCanvasNode - The JavaFX canvas on which to activate the tool
        Returns:
        The PaintToolBuilder

      • makeActiveOnCanvas

        Makes the newly built tool active on the given canvas. The tool can be activated manually (instead of via this method by invoking PaintTool.activate(PaintCanvas)).
        Parameters:
        canvas - The Swing canvas on which to activate the tool
        Returns:
        The PaintToolBuilder

      • withStroke

        public PaintToolBuilder withStroke(Stroke stroke)
        Specifies the stroke to be drawn by the tool. The stroke represents the shape of "pen" used to draw paths, lines, and brush strokes. Use StrokeBuilder to create complex strokes.
        Parameters:
        stroke - The stroke to be drawn by this tool
        Returns:
        Ths PaintToolBuilder

      • withIntensity

        public PaintToolBuilder withIntensity(double intensity)
        Specifies the intensity with which the tool paints. Used only by the AirbrushTool.
        Parameters:
        intensity - A value between 0.0 and 1.0 where 0 is no intensity (tool produces no paint) and 1.0 is full intensity.
        Returns:
        The PaintToolBuilder

      • withIntensityObservable

        public PaintToolBuilder withIntensityObservable(io.reactivex.Observable<Double> intensityObservable)
        Specifies an observable provider of the intensity with which the tool paints. See withIntensity(double).
        Parameters:
        intensityObservable - A value between 0.0 and 1.0 where 0 is no intensity (tool produces no paint) and 1.0 is full intensity.
        Returns:
        The PaintToolBuilder

        Parameters:
